LanguageData.VCE_AquaticGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow aquatic plants.
LanguageData.VCE_SandyGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow sandy terrain plants.
LanguageData.VCE_NotInEquator: Not in equatorial region (in this planet, below {0} latitude). Growing normally.
LanguageData.VCE_NeedsShade: This plant needs to grow in shade: outside, but under a roof.
LanguageData.VCE_NotPollinated: No apiary found in a 6 tiles radius (calculated on sowing)
